title: Gemini CLI
author: sync
aiHeadline: Google releases Gemini CLI, because who doesn't want another open-source project that will be deprecated in 6 months?

title: A new PNG spec
author: tbillington
aiHeadline: PNG is back, but this time it's the same file format with a new spec and the same file size. Innovation!

title: OpenAI charges by the minute, so speed up your audio
author: georgemandis
aiHeadline: OpenAI charges by the minute, so now you can spend your money wisely by talking faster and making your voice sound like a chipmunk.

title: What Problems to Solve (1966)
author: jxmorris12
aiHeadline: 1966 letter by Feynman on what problems to solve, because clearly we haven't solved any of them yet and need some timeless advice.

title: Reading NFC Passport Chips in Linux
author: robin_reala
aiHeadline: Reading NFC passport chips in Linux, because nothing says 'fun weekend project' like reverse-engineering government security protocols.
